response.original_title: Maggie And The Ferocious Beast - Rain Showers and Spring Flowers
response.overview: Spring is in the air! Come celebrate the coming of spring and the power of friendship with the adventures of Maggie and her pals: the large and lovable Ferocious Beast and the steadfast and true pig, Hamilton Hocks.  Includes Episodes: What's In A Bag Rainy Day Chasing A Rainbow The Bunny Slippers Beastly Picture The Push-Me Popper Don't Dump That Junk Soup Bowls And Roller Coasters Hamilton's Magic Nedley's Circus The Windy Day Nedley's Glasses
response.title: Maggie And The Ferocious Beast - Rain Showers and Spring Flowers
